coreAttributes.name: Unlikely-Whammer
coreAttributes.description: Although this may look and taste like an ordinary burger, the packaging declares this 'Unlikely-Whammer' to be 100% meat free. Printed in very small, hard-to-read text, there's a disclaimer which states that the meat substitute is 'dangerously high in female hormones'...
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
#IF(npc.getOccupation()==OCCUPATION_TOURIST) [##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/5)]

The taste of the burger reminds [npc.name] of home, and [npc.she] [npc.verb(start)] to feel a lot more energetic!

[#npc.incrementFemininity(10)] #ELSE [##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/10)]

[npc.Name] [npc.verb(feel)] the burger's side effects kicking in almost immediately...

[#npc.incrementFemininity(10)] #ENDIF

useDescriptions.selfUse: Unwrapping the Unlikey-Whammer's paper covering, [npc.name] quickly [npc.verb(reveal)] the greasy cheeseburger contained within. Bringing it up to [npc.her] mouth, [npc.she] [npc.verb(take)] a big bite, and [npc.verb(discover)] that it's absolutely delicious. Encouraged by the taste, it only takes [npc.herHim] a few moments to wolf down the meal.
useDescriptions.otherUse: Unwrapping the Unlikey-Whammer's paper covering, [npc.name] quickly [npc.verb(reveal)] the greasy cheeseburger contained within, before offering it to [npc2.name]. Bringing it up to [npc2.her] mouth, [npc2.name] [npc2.verb(take)] a big bite, and [npc2.verb(discover)] that it's absolutely delicious. Encouraged by the taste, it only takes [npc2.herHim] a few moments to wolf down the meal.
